stories.original_headline: Life may have started as sticky goo clinging to rocks
stories.original_summary: Life may have started in sticky, rock-hugging gels rather than inside cells. Researchers suggest these primitive, biofilm-like materials could trap and concentrate molecules, giving early chemistry a protected space to grow more complex. Within these gels, the first hints of metabolism and self-repl
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Alchemists Uncover Life's First Sticky Beginnings
stories.fantasy_story: Ancient Alchemists believe the earliest sparks of life might have begun as special sticky goo clinging to damp rocks. This magical gel could gather tiny mystical essences, allowing elementary arcane workings to flourish safely. Within these growing patches, life's first whispers of growth and self-renewal stirred.

stories.original_headline: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS is spraying water across the solar system
stories.original_summary: For millions of years, a frozen wanderer drifted between the stars before slipping into our solar system as 3I/ATLAS—only the third known interstellar comet ever spotted. When scientists turned NASA’s Swift Observatory toward it, they caught the first-ever hint of water from such an object, detected
stories.fantasy_headline: Star-Traveling Ice Shard Sprays Pure Celestial Dew Across Our Realm
stories.fantasy_story: A magnificent ice wanderer, having journeyed for ages between the stars, has finally entered our own sky kingdom. Celestial wizards, observing with a grand arcane spyglass, have discovered it is shedding pure, life-giving dew. This rare sight hints at hidden springs far beyond our known world.

stories.original_headline: Two more xAI co-founders are among those leaving after the SpaceX merger
stories.original_summary: Since the xAI-SpaceX merger announced last week, which combined the two companies (as well as social media platform X) for a reported $1.25 trillion valuation - the biggest merger of all time - a handful of xAI employees and two of its co-founders have abruptly exited the company, penning long depar
stories.fantasy_headline: Master Artificers Depart Whispering Engine Clan After Grand Alliance
stories.fantasy_story: Following the Whispering Engine Clan's grand alliance with the Sky-Voyager Guild and the Oracle Scrying Network, worth a vast treasure in gold coins, some key members have departed. Two master artificers, who founded the Whispering Engine, have notably chosen to leave their posts.
